ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: heh, I started a Wood Elf warrior last night to make arrows for my DE, since there is nowhere for darks to buy fletching materials....got him up to 5th in
ygData.messageBody:
heh, I started a Wood Elf warrior last night to make arrows for my DE, since there is nowhere for darks to buy fletching materials....got him up to 5th in about 3 hours, without a single twinked item on him.....but anyways......

1. At the various gypsy camps

2. I've had many warriors with many types of armor, I may be wrong, but I've never noticed between ring, chain, or banded, other than weight.

3. parry is blocking an attack

4. To my knowledge enchanters can not put perminant enchantments on items other than bars of copper, silver, gold, plat.

5. never messed much with quest, yet to see or hear of a low level quest that is actually worth the time and effort.

Salr D'Taynkk
Dark Warrior of The Kith
Veeshan

>>> "Dean B." <gino_14@...> 5.17.99 8:31:24 PM >>>
From: "Dean B." <gino_14@...>

Hail All !
Not To brag - I'm a Human, Warrior(lvl 10) and I just got this game about
one month ago. I'm still getting used to it's lingo and such-forth but I'm
having a few questions/help/input thats on my mind.


1. Now, I need a magical sword, so that I can kill Wisp's... I'm thinking
about investing into a 'Combined 2H Sword'. I've herd they can very from
75pp - 120pp. I'm wondering where I can get it.

P.S Where is the best place to hunt wisp's. (I've herd they offer good money
drops)


2. For a lvl 10, I have RingMail tunic, RingMail pants & RingMail sleeve's.
I've switched to RingMail couse I've found there a little bit less then
Banded Mail and you get the same AC but a little more weight. I've also
noticed that with RingMail that monsters tend to miss a bit more and I dodge
more quicker then Banded Mail.


3. When I reach lvl 12, What does perry skill do?


4. I was wondering, I have a Kite Shield and one Mino Battle Axe. When I
get dule wielding, I'll buy another Mino Battle Axe... Is there some way I
can contact a lvl35+ Enchanter and he/she could make my Mino Battle Axe
magical somehow OR even make the delay better?


5. Ok, I'm having trouble with some quest's... What are good ones that
offer good money, Experience Points & and a all around good item?

Thanks for reading my newbie questions!
Dean Boyle

Server: Karana
Name: Dealan <The Light of Norrath>
